${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:DamageMagnify.NAME: Damage Magnify
${modID}:DamageMagnify.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Multiply its damage by !M! this combat. Exhaust.

${modID}:EnergyDiminish.NAME: Energy Diminish
${modID}:EnergyDiminish.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Halve its cost for this combat (round to even). NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DamageIncrease.NAME: Damage Increase
${modID}:DamageIncrease.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand with damage. It gains !M! damage for this combat.

${modID}:BlockIncrease.NAME: Block Increase
${modID}:BlockIncrease.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand with Block. It gains !M! Block for this combat.

${modID}:EnergyDecrease.NAME: Energy Decrease
${modID}:EnergyDecrease.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Reduce its cost by !M! for this combat.

${modID}:BlockMagnify.NAME: Block Magnify
${modID}:BlockMagnify.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. It gains !M!x Block for this combat. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:HPShrink.NAME: HP Shrink
${modID}:HPShrink.DESCRIPTION: Set an enemy's HP to 50% of its current HP (round to even). NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Execute.NAME: Execute
${modID}:Execute.DESCRIPTION: If the target has 10% HP or less, kill it.

${modID}:TaiChi.NAME: Tai Chi
${modID}:TaiChi.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an #yAttack, gain !M! #yBlock. Whenever you play a non-attack card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:Purify.NAME: Purify
${modID}:Purify.DESCRIPTION: Remove all buffs from an enemy. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Cleave.NAME: Cleave
${modID}:Cleave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an enemy. Deal 50% of that damage to all other enemies.

${modID}:Negate.NAME: Negate
${modID}:Negate.DESCRIPTION: Negate the target enemy's intent. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:Ramp.NAME: Ramp
${modID}:Ramp.DESCRIPTION: Increase your maximum [E] by !M! this combat. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:WildCard.NAME: WildCard
${modID}:WildCard.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your deck. This becomes a copy of it for the rest of this combat.
